about.title: About Me
about.summary: Experienced full-stack developer with over three years of professional experience in designing and implementing scalable web applications using Angular, NestJS, and TypeScript. Skilled at delivering high-impact solutions that drive performance improvements, enhance user satisfaction, and streamline operations. Proficient in both front-end and back-end development, with a strong focus on mentoring and team collaboration.

summary.main: In my current role at Elham, I am working on the Elham project as a Frontend Developer, focusing on creating responsive and user-friendly interfaces using Angular. My work emphasizes delivering high-quality, visually appealing designs for the educational platform. Previously, in this position, I contributed to the Maher project as a Full Stack Developer, where I developed scalable solutions using Nx workspace, NestJS, PostgreSQL, AWS, and Angular.Here's a glimpse of my contributions and responsibilities throughout the project:

bullet_points: Increased system efficiency by 20% by leading the development and deployment of a full-stack application using Nx workspace, NestJs, PostgreSQL, AWS, and Angular.
Reduced code defects by 15% by adopting test-driven development (TDD) methodologies and ensuring high-quality releases.
Spearheaded mentoring initiatives for junior developers, improving onboarding efficiency and reducing ramp-up time by 30%.
Successfully migrated legacy systems to a modern, scalable architecture, cutting operational costs by 25%.

summary.main: In my previous role at ABA Technology, I contributed significantly to the E-services Platform for DMP (Direction des Médicaments et de la Pharmacie) as a Full Stack Developer. This innovative platform is dedicated to the evaluation of registration files and quality control of various health products, including medicines. Here's a glimpse of my contributions and responsibilities throughout the project:

bullet_points: Designed and implemented RESTful APIs, optimizing database queries and improving data retrieval speed by 25% .
Added high-value features to applications using Angular and NestJS, increasing end-user satisfaction scores by 30%.
Resolved critical bugs and improved system uptime by 15%, ensuring smooth operations for enterprise clients.
Conducted weekly team workshops, sharing best practices in JavaScript and Angular, and fostering a culture of continuous learning.

summary.main: In my role as a Full Stack Developer at Novaxys from June 2021 to December 2021 in Casablanca, Morocco, I focused on delivering high-performance, scalable web applications tailored to large-scale international projects. Here’s a summary of my contributions and achievements:

bullet_points: Delivered a 20% performance boost by designing responsive, scalable web applications with Angular, Python, and Node.js.
Reduced project timelines by 30% by implementing efficient workflows and reusable components for large-scale international projects.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to troubleshoot deployment issues, ensuring 99% successful project deliveries.
